name: Medieval Catfish
description:
Medieval Catfish puts you in the shoes of a traveller in a Tavern at night. Peasants, Witchcraft and Superstition. You can speak to people hanging out there, and make it look like you're the person they are waiting for. Through dialogs and exploration, you'll be able to gather informations about all the tavern's customers. Some unrealistic stories, almost heroic actions and local adventurers tell tales.

Credits : 

Exercice Ecole Georges Méliès

Damien De Boëver

Mathilde Degris

Léonard Vasseur

Enzo Vestry
